import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Slide } from 'react-slideshow-image'; import Syria from './assets/syriacover.jpg'; import Thai from './assets/thaicavecover.png'; import Crossword from './assets/nytcrossword.jpg'; import GasTracer from './assets/gastracer.gif'; import Molex1 from './assets/2080card.png'; import Palette from './assets/playfulpalette2.jpg'; //icons import Github from './assets/icons/svg/032-github.svg'; import Youtube from './assets/icons/svg/116-youtube.svg'; class Portfolio extends Component { render() { const slideImages = [ Syria, Thai, Crossword ]; const properties = { duration: 5000, transitionDuration: 500, infinite: true, prevArrow:
, nextArrow:
}; return (

Portfolio

1 of 5

Project

Adobe's Playful Palette

coding

ux design

For my senior design project, I recreated Adobe's Playful Palette, an interactive parametric color mixer for artists that was proposed by Adobe Research in 2017. The palette allows you to blend color blobs to create gradients, and maintains an infinite history so that strokes can easily be recolored.



Tools Used: WebGL, JavaScript, HTML/CSS

2 of 5

Project

Disney Imagineering

As a Product Management intern, I independently designed a cohesive set of 2-D/3-D graphics and animations to market the company's new line of power connectors. I also mocked up VR/AR visuals for web and mobile to drive the use of immersive technology in marketing.

3 of 5

Internship

{/*
*/}

The New York Times

As a Graphics intern on the Immersive team, I prototyped 3-D assets to visualize AR moments, researched and tested the use of the Microsoft Hololens in future articles, and created cover images and diagrams as seen here and here. During the Maker's Week Hackathon, I also helped build the front end for our intern-led 3-D Crossword project.

4 of 5

Internship

Molex

As a Product Management intern, I independently designed a cohesive set of 2-D/3-D graphics and animations to market the company's new line of power connectors. I also mocked up VR/AR visuals for web and mobile to drive the use of immersive technology in marketing.

5 of 5

Volunteering

Spicy Green Book

As a Product Management intern, I independently designed a cohesive set of 2-D/3-D graphics and animations to market the company's new line of power connectors. I also mocked up VR/AR visuals for web and mobile to drive the use of immersive technology in marketing.
